decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Location Plan; ST_NOV 21_15 END_001 Rev A Existing Plans; ST_NOV 21_15 END_002 Rev A Proposed Plans; ST_NOV 21_15 END_003 Rev A Proposed Section; ST_NOV 21_15 END_004 Rev A Proposed Elevations; ST_NOV 21_15 END_005 Rev A Existing Elevations & Section.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013). | The side second floor window, shall be obscure glazed and non-openable below 1.70m from floor level, unless otherwise confirmed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
Reason: To safeguard neighbouring amenity from overlooking in accordance with policy 7A of Ealing's Development Management DPD (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Roof extension to rear (main) roof slope; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope and installation of two rooflights to front roof slope; installation of window to outrigger side elevation (following removal of existing chimney stack)
